thread.title: Istonish Announces Appointment of New Chief Operating Officer
thread.title_full: Istonish Announces Appointment of New Chief Operating Officer

author: Debbie Josendale
title: Istonish Announces Appointment of New Chief Operating Officer
text:
Istonish, Inc. a leading provider of Managed IT Services, announces the appointment of Rod Taylor as Chief Operating Officer. Taylor joined Istonish in 2010 and most recently served as V.P. IT & Managed Services. In this role, Taylor has focused on continued innovation to increase the client value of the Istonish Managed Service offerings including Help Desk, Infrastructure Support, Cloud Solutions, Network and Application Security and Hosted IVR/TPV Contact Center.
“I’m pleased to announce the appointment of Rod Taylor to COO,” said Annette Quintana CEO. “Since joining Istonish, Rod has played a key role in both the growth and evolution of Istonish as we continue to deliver complex and critical technology solutions to our clients. He has also hired and developed a top team of engineers, project managers, developers and TPV agents which are vital to the continued tradition of delivering excellent service. I’m confident that Rod’s leadership and expertise will help move Istonish to the next level.”
Taylor holds a Bachelor’s degree in Information Management and a Master’s degree in Business Administration from California State University. Concentrating on a “customer-first” approach throughout his career, Taylor has more than 25 years of business, management, technology, and sales experience.
“I’m excited to assume the role of COO of Istonish at this important time in the history of our company,” said Taylor. “We’re celebrating our twenty-fifth anniversary this year and Istonish is poised for continued growth by delivering innovative solutions that solve the complex technology requirements of our clients. We will continue the tradition of providing the best products and services to our customers by focusing on their needs and expectations.”
About Istonish, Inc.
Celebrating 25 years in business, Istonish is an award winning technology service provider. Based in Denver, CO, service offerings include IT Managed Services, Consulting, and Hosted IVR/ Third Party Verification Contact Center. Istonish has established itself as a company with a strong foundation in community involvement and valued client relationships. To learn more please visit http://www.Istonish.com .
